Volt Partenza
V démarr.
Anfahrspannung
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0-255

Bremszeit (0-255)

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at top throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255

Volt Massimi
Vmax
Höchstgeschwindigkeit
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at midrange throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255

Volt Intermedi
Vmoy
Mittengeschwindigkeit
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment
variable.label: Consist Acceleration Adjustment

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment
variable.label: Consist Deceleration Adjustment
Fluorescent Flicker
variable.tooltip:
- Only Aux 1 and 2: Front and rear lighting normal,
Aux 1 (green) and Aux 2 (purple) on,
fluorescent flicker is active. All lighting controlled by F0.

-All lights: Front and Rear lighting become linked to Aux 1 and Aux 2,
and fluorescent flicker is active on all light outputs.
All lighting is simultaneously on or off. All are controlled by F0.

variable.label: "White Wire" (F0f) Effect
variable.tooltip:
Physical output "White" (default F0f)
Not documented, values to be confirmed.

variable.label: "Yellow Wire" (F0r) Effect
variable.tooltip:
Physical output "Yellow" (default F0r)
Not documented, values to be confirmed.

variable.label: "Green Wire" (F1) Effect
variable.tooltip:
Physical output "Green" (default F1)
Not documented, values to be confirmed.

variable.label: "Purple Wire" (F2) Effect
variable.tooltip:
Physical output "Purple" (default F2)
Not documented, values to be confirmed.

variable.label: Year and Month of Manufacture
variable.tooltip:
Format: yyx
Year 201x = last digit x
Month = yy
e.g. 25 = 2nd month, 2015
e.g. 115 = 11th month, 2015
Turn off/on(default) BEMF, enabling BEMF disables Dither/Stimulation
variable.label: BEMF Enable
Enable BEMF button control
variable.tooltip:
Disable(default)/Enable button control of BEMF
BEMF control button to be selected on function map.

variable.label: Motor Button Control
variable.tooltip:
Motor controlled by Function button
Motor control button to be selected on function map.

variable.label: Button Control Direction
variable.tooltip:
If motor button control is enabled.
Use forward/reverse buttons if "F2 On/Off" selected.

Power to button controlled motor
variable.tooltip:
If motor button control is enabled.
Power level (drive voltage) for button control of the motor circuit (range 0-255)

variable.label: Random Flicker Control
variable.tooltip:
adjusting this CV can make firebox flicker work differently
to emulate gas or oil lamp flicker

factReset.label: Reset All CVs
Reset delle CV ai valori di fabbrica

label.text: If Acceleration Rates 2 & 3 and Deceleration Rates 5 & 4 are all set to zero,
then Base accel/decel rates (CV3 & CV4) apply to the whole speed range.
DCC Concepts Decoders offer a decoder locking mechanism
which can be useful when several decoders are used in one loco
on the same address, e.g. for adding sound
DCC Concepts suggests values of 1=mobile, 2=sound, 3=light/function only
Set CV15 equal to this number to unlock the decoder for programming
To use the Decoder Lock (CV15) must be set manually from the single CV programmer, or make use of the multi-decoder tool
Several CVs are not documented in the available manufacturer's official documentation.
Therefore some default values, ranges and meaning have been extrapolated from previous DCCconcepts range of decoder.
DCCconcepts reserves the right to modify several CVs values and usage in the future,
and invites users to carefully check the decoder version in CV7.
This decoder definition is intended only for versions CV7 = 34 or 35.
